long_description: Updates to the ASICS Gel-Cumulus 15 Road-Running Shoes improve both the fit of the uppers and the cushioning to create an exceptionally comfortable ride for underpronators to mild overpronators. Shoes are designed to slow pronation and enhance the foot's natural gait from heel strike through toe-off. Airy mesh and synthetic leather overlays throughout the uppers provide excellent breathability and flex with just enough support. Memory foam-lined collars mold to the feet for excellent comfort around the ankles and at the heels. Wicking polyester linings move excess moisture away from feet and dry fast. Exceptionally lightweight midsoles use proprietary polymer material for excellent rebound, long-lasting cushioning and out-of-the box comfort. Forefoot and rearfoot silicone-based gel inserts absorb excess shock in all directions, delivering cushioning and stability. ASICS Gel-Cumulus 15 Road-Running Shoes have a vertical flex groove in the rubber outsoles that follows the line of progression through the gait cycle to enhance efficiency.
short_description: Updates to the ASICS Gel-Cumulus 15 Road-Running Shoes improve both the fit of the uppers and the cushioning to create an exceptionally comfortable ride for underpronators to mild overpronators.
